title: How do I cash in to GCash using Payoneer?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I link my Payoneer to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900002482846-How-do-I-link-my-Payoneer-to-GCash)
- [How do I cash in to GCash using Payoneer?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900002482806-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-using-Payoneer)
- [How do I link my PayPal to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360019948834-How-do-I-link-my-PayPal-to-GCash)
- [How do I cash in to GCash using PayPal?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020281973-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-using-PayPal)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Check your [GCash Wallet and Transaction limits](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits), and follow these steps to cash in from a linked Payoneer account:

1. On the GCash homepage, tap **Cash In**.
2. Select **Global Banks and Partners** **\> Payoneer**
3. Choose your **currency balance** and enter the **amount**
4. Review the details, then tap **Confirm**
5. Enter the **OTP** sent to your GCash-registered mobile number

Your cash-in will be processed in about **5 minutes**, and youâ€™ll receive a GCash in-app notification.

**Note:**

Linking and cashing in to GCash with Payoneer increases your wallet and transaction limit to PHP500,000.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [What are the GCash Cash In fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017595774)

- [How do I cash in to GCash from my online banking app or website?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40227839506457)
- [I didn't receive my cash in to my GCash wallet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28525930255769)
